rendogclient.midnightconfig.title: RendogClient Settings
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownEnab: Enables the Cooldown GUI. (Even if disabled, cooldown calculations will still occur internally.)
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIX: The X position of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIY: The Y position of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIS: The scale factor of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownChat:
How many milliseconds the client waits to detect the next left-click chat information.
If the value is too small, it may overwrite another weapon's cooldown.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cdr.tooltip:
Percentage of cooldown reduction.
Cooldown detected by clicks will be reduced by the given percentage value.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIR: Skip item rendering, useful when the GUI overlaps with the hotbar.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIX.t: The X position of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIY.t: The Y position of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUISca: The scale factor of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.maxHealth.to:
Max health value from RendogServer.
Use /hp command to check it.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.lowHealthThr: The health value at which the client considers the player to have low health.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIPre: A prefix text displayed in front of the health value in the GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUINor: The color used to display health in normal conditions.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUILow: The color used to display health when it is below the low health threshold.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIFul: The color used to display health when it is at maximum.
